mapper.select: select tus.remark as equipmentName, gt.type_name,c.customer_id,c.status,c.phenomenon,c.appointmentTime,c.createTime,e.equipmentName,e.equipment_id,c.repairType,c.orderNum from tb_customerservice c LEFT JOIN tb_equipment e on c.equipment_id = e.equipment_id left join guarantee_type gt on gt.id=c.repairType left join tb_user_share tus on tus.share_user_id=c.user_id AND tus.`equipment_id`=e.equipment_id where c.user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY c.createTime DESC

select c.customer_id,c.status,c.phenomenon,c.appointmentTime,c.createTime,e.equipmentName from tb_customerservice c LEFT JOIN tb_equipment e on c.equipment_id = e.equipment_id where e.equipment_id = #{equipment_id} ORDER BY c.createTime DESC

select tus.remark as equipmentName, c.*,e.equipmentName,e.equipmentNum,e.type, gt.type_name as repairTypeText from tb_customerservice c LEFT JOIN tb_equipment e on c.equipment_id = e.equipment_id left join guarantee_type gt on gt.id=c.repairType left join tb_user_share tus on tus.share_user_id=c.user_id AND tus.`equipment_id`=e.equipment_id where c.customer_id = #{customer_id}
